ComicInfo.Title: Potato Sacks; If the Whole World Turned Fat; Cracked Interviews the Break Dancing King; The Charming India Fire Department; A Cracked Western You'll Never See; If Different National Products Became the World Money Standard; You Know You're a Super Type...; Kitchen-Land; A Cracked Catalog of Equipment and Supplies for Weathering Winter; Products for Pampered Pets; The Cracked Movie V
ComicInfo.Summary:
Hudd and Dini try to escape prison by hiding inside potato sacks but the sacks are brought to the prison kitchen.
A fire department in India hires snake charmers to charm fire hoses.
A woman is tied to train tracks. A cowboy takes some of the rope to lasso a bull but leaves the woman fastened to the tracks.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 22:52:06. [Issue ID 250572]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Don Orehek,John Severin,Vance Rodewalt,Warren Sattler,Rurik Tyler
ComicInfo.Inker: Don Orehek,John Severin,Vance Rodewalt,Warren Sattler,Rurik Tyler
